name: Spectator
pages: A Spectator is a small aberration that spawns in the deep depths of the Underworld or in the Nether. It is the smallest of the beholderkin aberrations.

$(l)Number$(): 1$(br)$(l)Size$(): Small$(br)$(l)Level$(): Mob$(br)$(l)Rarity$(): Scarce$(br)$(l)Movement$(): Flies/Hovers$(br)$(l)Speed$(): Normal$(br)$(l)Health$(): 16hp$(br)$(l)Damage/Strength$(): 4hp$(br)$(l)Daylight$(): Yes$(br)$(l)Despawn$(): Yes$(br)$(l)Spawns$(): Underworld, Nether
$(l)Weapons/Specials$():$(br)- Can cast Paralysis spell.$(br)- Charges at its target.
